definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: These are addressed to our training company commander Liu often shouted words.
sentences.chinese: 以上都是刘连长在给我们训练时常喊的话。

sentences.english: Qionghua joins the Red Detachment, and is presented a rifle by her Company Officer.
sentences.chinese: 琼花随即加入娘子军，并由连长授枪。

sentences.english: Colby went up to his CO to ask for orders.
sentences.chinese: 科尔比站出来找到连长，请求他下命令。

sentences.english: Officers were called by their titles, such as Squad Commander Chang or Company Commander Wang.
sentences.chinese: 军官是按照所任职务称呼的，如张班长或王连长。

sentences.english: The season with four soldiers jumped out of sheer precipice and overhanging rocks together.
sentences.chinese: 季连长带着四名战士携手跳下悬崖绝壁。

sentences.english: He was commended by the company commander for his distinguished performance in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 他在战斗中表现突出，受到连长的表扬。

sentences.english: The soldier faltered for a moment as their captain fell.
sentences.chinese: 当他们连长倒下时，士兵们动摇了一会儿。

sentences.english: When a company commander in the report the situation to huang feng died under the sniper rifle of the devil.
sentences.chinese: 一连长在向黄鸣锋汇报战况时死在了鬼子的狙击枪下。

sentences.english: In January 1945, he was serving as company commander in eastern France.
sentences.chinese: 一九四五年一月，他在法国东部担任连长。

sentences.english: But Sanmao served unexpectedly in the army as an orderly for his company officer.
sentences.chinese: 但是没有想到，三毛进军队后做了连长的勤务兵。

sentences.english: The company commander roared his command.
The company commander has received order from the General Staff that his company would move to the front.
sentences.chinese: 连长接到参谋部的命令说他的连队要开往前线。

sentences.english: The leader of our company is a well-known combat hero.
sentences.chinese: 我们的连长是一位著名的战斗英雄。

sentences.english: The company commander inspects the sentries every night.
sentences.chinese: 每天晚上连长都要查岗。

sentences.english: The company commander was running around and shouting that we should dig like crazy.
sentences.chinese: 连长跑来跑去，喊着让我们玩命地挖战壕。

sentences.english: Speaking of the recruits, it is to let a company commander of love and hate.
sentences.chinese: 说起这个新兵蛋子，真是让连长又爱又恨。
